citation: Proclamation under the Children, Young Persons and Their Families Act 1997 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Children, Young Persons and Their Families Act 1997

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Children, Young Persons and Their Families Act 1997 , fix 1 July 2000 as the day on which that Act commences.

13 June 2000

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

FRAN BLADEL

for and on behalf of the Minister for Health and Human Services

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 21 June 2000

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
